actions.name: AcceptInvitation
actions.description: Grants permission to accept an invitation to become a member of a behavior graph

actions.name: CreateGraph
actions.description: Grants permission to create a behavior graph and begin to aggregate security information

actions.name: CreateMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to request the membership of one or more accounts in a behavior graph managed by this account

actions.name: DeleteGraph
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a behavior graph and stop aggregating security information

actions.name: DeleteMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to remove member accounts from a behavior graph managed by this account

actions.name: DescribeOrganizationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to view the current configuration related to the Amazon Detective integration with AWS Organizations

actions.name: DisableOrganizationAdminAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the Amazon Detective delegated administrator account for an organization

actions.name: DisassociateMembership
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the association of this account with a behavior graph

actions.name: EnableOrganizationAdminAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to designate the Amazon Detective delegated administrator account for an organization

actions.name: GetFreeTrialEligibility
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a behavior graph's eligibility for a free trial period

actions.name: GetGraphIngestState
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the data ingestion state of a behavior graph

actions.name: GetMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details on specified members of a behavior graph

actions.name: GetPricingInformation
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about Amazon Detective's pricing

actions.name: GetUsageInformation
actions.description: Grants permission to list usage information of a behavior graph

actions.name: ListGraphs
actions.description: Grants permission to list behavior graphs managed by this account

actions.name: ListInvitations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details on the behavior graphs to which this account has been invited to join

actions.name: ListMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details on all members of a behavior graph

actions.name: ListOrganizationAdminAccounts
actions.description: Grants permission to view the current Amazon Detective delegated administrator account for an organization

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tag values that are assigned to a behavior graph

actions.name: RejectInvitation
actions.description: Grants permission to reject an invitation to become a member of a behavior graph

actions.name: SearchGraph
actions.description: Grants permission to search the data stored in a behavior graph

actions.name: StartMonitoringMember
actions.description: Grants permission to start data ingest for a member account that has a status of ACCEPTED_BUT_DISABLED

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to assign tag values to a behavior graph

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tag values from a behavior graph

actions.name: UpdateOrganizationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update the current configuration related to the Amazon Detective integration with AWS Organizations
